snippet.title: Swords & Soldiers II - Introduction trailer
snippet.description:
Get a quick introduction to the beautiful world of Swords & Soldiers II, from our friend Brokenbeard! 

Swords & Soldiers II is a side scrolling strategy game by Ronimo games, which will be available exclusively in the eShop on Nintendo Wii U starting May 21st.

www.swordsandsoldiers2.com
